To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Counterattack _counterattack;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_counterattack = Counterattack(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_counterattack.IsReady)
{
    var period = _counterattack.Period.Value;
    var current = _counterattack.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.counterattack = self.Counterattack(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.counterattack.IsReady:
    period = self.counterattack.Period.Value
    current = self.counterattack.Current.Value
